user.title: Add iPhone/iPad
user.description:
Choose how you want to name your device:

• **Use Mobile App Device name (with reference)**: Links this integration to an existing Mobile App device. The name will be taken from that device, and you'll have a reference connection between them.

• **Use custom name**: Enter any name you want. This creates a standalone entry without linking to a Mobile App device.

error.no_mobile_app_devices: No Mobile App devices found. Please use custom name instead.
